Integrations, Modules, and Libraries in Orquestra Core#

Orquestra Core is made up of multiple packages, each with its own functionality. For more info on how those packages are broken up, check out this page.

Within those packages, there are different options for certain objects (like Backends, Optimizers, etc). This page aims to be an up-to-date list of these options you have so you can choose from what’s available. If you notice something that’s missing here, or you create your own you want added, open a pull request on this repository!

Ansatzes#

  • XAnsatz

  • XZAnsatz

  • QAOAFarhiAnsatz

  • WarmStartQAOAAnsatz

  • HEAQuantumCompilingAnsatz

  • SingletUCCSDAnsatz

Backends (including simulators)#

  • SymbolicSimulator

  • ForestSimulator

  • CirqSimulator

  • QiskitSimulator has multiple options

    • aer_simulator

    • aer_simulator_statevector

  • QiskitBackend

  • QulacsSimulator

Noise Models#

  • Cirq

  • Qiskit

Optimizers#

  • BasinHoppingOptimizer

  • CMAESOptimizer

  • QiskitOptimizer

  • ScipyOptimizer

  • SearchPointsOptimizer

  • SimpleGradientDescent

Problems#

  • GraphPartitioning

  • MaxIndependentSet

  • MaxCut

  • VertexCover
